description.en:
### After school Hamekatsu Diary

1. Rental Ojisan / Ojisan Rental (おじさんレンタ)
2. Rental Ojisan Case: Akari Akiyama / Ojisan Rental Case: Akiyama Akari (おじさんレンタ case. 秋山あかり)
3. Shisen -Manazashi- (姉線 -まなざし-)
4. So That the Clumsy Me Can Get a Recommendation for My Preferred University, / Donkusai Watashi ga Shiboudai e Suisen shite Marou Tame ni, (ドンくさい私が志望大へ推薦してもらうために、)
5. Rumor Gal→Nomoto-san (ルーモアギャル→野本さん)
6. Wakamiya-san and the Pig / Wakamiya-san to Buta (若宮さんとブタ)
7. Flat-chest Girlfriend & Clingy Boyfriend / Hinchichi Kanojo to Gattsuki Kareshi (貧乳(ひんちち)彼女とガッツキ彼氏); COMIC Koh 2017-07
8. After School Mastermind / Houkago no Mastermind (放課後のマスターマインド)
